name: Marabou
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t MarabouQueries -o Marabou.queries/ --network f:fake.onnx

name: Agda
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t Agda -o Agda.agda -c proofcache.vclp --network f:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction
run: vehicle compile -s spec.vcl -t LossFunction -o LossFunction.json --network f:NO_FILE
